name: part_002
file: tmp_【3D】hololive English -Advent- 2nd Anniversary Live： On the Run! [dpcCFGRm5zM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Shiori Novella explains the rules and hazards of the 'Go-Kart Escape' mini-game to the other members of Advent.
Koseki Bijou takes her turn playing the game while the others cheer and commentate.
The group reviews Bijou's score, and Shiori Novella prepares for her turn.
Shiori Novella plays the game, employing a unique strategy and comparing the experience to driving in New York.
Shiori's score is revealed, and Fuwawa and Mococo prepare for their attempt.
Fuwawa and Mococo start their turn in the Go-Kart Escape game.

subtitles.original: You'll either gain points or lose points based...
subtitles.english: You'll either gain points or lose points based...

subtitles.original: ...but you don't know, so it's a risk every time.
subtitles.english: ...but you don't know, so it's a risk every time.

subtitles.original: And then, there is the Big Moai!
subtitles.english: And then, there is the Big Moai!

subtitles.original: Moai! The big Moai!
subtitles.english: Moai! The big Moai!

subtitles.original: It will block your path.
subtitles.english: It will block your path.

subtitles.original: It is minus 20 points if you hit it, so don't hit it.
subtitles.english: It is minus 20 points if you hit it, so don't hit it.

subtitles.original: Don't hit it! Yeah, don't hit it.
subtitles.english: Don't hit it! Yeah, don't hit it.

subtitles.original: And then, the Pebble!
subtitles.english: And then, the Pebble!

subtitles.original: I have kidnapped one of my Pebbles to use as a sacrifice.
subtitles.english: I have kidnapped one of my Pebbles to use as a sacrifice.

subtitles.original: If you hit it, minus 5 points. But you know what?
subtitles.english: If you hit it, minus 5 points. But you know what?

subtitles.original: I don't think Bijou would mind if you hit it, to be honest.
subtitles.english: I don't think Bijou would mind if you hit it, to be honest.

subtitles.original: And the items will change depending on your first lap or second lap.
subtitles.english: And the items will change depending on your first lap or second lap.

subtitles.original: You're doing two laps. - Two laps!
subtitles.english: You're doing two laps. - Two laps!

subtitles.original: I guess time to show you how it's done.
subtitles.english: I guess time to show you how it's done.

subtitles.original: Alright, first lap, show us how to do it.
subtitles.english: Alright, first lap, show us how to do it.

subtitles.original: I'm ready!
subtitles.english: I'm ready!

subtitles.original: Go! Go Bijou! - Faster, faster!
subtitles.english: Go! Go Bijou! - Faster, faster!

subtitles.original: She gets the first one! She makes it!
subtitles.english: She gets the first one! She makes it!

subtitles.original: Second crystal, watch out!
subtitles.english: Second crystal, watch out!

subtitles.original: Second lap, let's go!
subtitles.english: Second lap, let's go!

subtitles.original: Another crystal! She hit another one!
subtitles.english: Another crystal! She hit another one!

subtitles.original: The zombie's coming! Watch out!
subtitles.english: The zombie's coming! Watch out!

subtitles.original: I think you got a bit of bad luck with that crystal at the end.
subtitles.english: I think you got a bit of bad luck with that crystal at the end.

subtitles.original: How many points did I get?
subtitles.english: How many points did I get?

subtitles.original: That's a good question. How many points did you get?
subtitles.english: That's a good question. How many points did you get?

subtitles.original: I think you got one point.
subtitles.english: I think you got one point.

subtitles.original: Bijou's Points: 1pt
subtitles.english: Bijou's Points: 1pt

subtitles.original: What? One point? Was it all negative?
subtitles.english: What? One point? Was it all negative?

subtitles.original: It's a group effort, we can still get points.
subtitles.english: It's a group effort, we can still get points.

subtitles.original: Just let the pro do all the work for you.
subtitles.english: Just let the pro do all the work for you.

subtitles.original: Show us how it's done, our fearless leader!
subtitles.english: Show us how it's done, our fearless leader!

subtitles.original: I have a plan.
subtitles.english: I have a plan.

subtitles.original: You'll figure it out when I say "plan"!
subtitles.english: You'll figure it out when I say "plan"!

subtitles.original: あの、ゾンビさん、先どうぞ。
subtitles.english: Um, Mr. Zombie, please go ahead.

subtitles.original: えっ、何？いい子ですね、いい子ですね。
subtitles.english: Eh, what? Such a good girl, such a good girl.

subtitles.original: Let's go!
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: It's like driving in New York!
subtitles.english: It's like driving in New York!

subtitles.original: It's not about the points, I just wanted to run them over.
subtitles.english: It's not about the points, I just wanted to run them over.

subtitles.original: How many points did I get?
subtitles.english: How many points did I get?

subtitles.original: Three points!
subtitles.english: Three points!

subtitles.original: Shiori's Points: 3pt
subtitles.english: Shiori's Points: 3pt

subtitles.original: That's two more points than Bijou!
subtitles.english: That's two more points than Bijou!

subtitles.original: I'll get four points!
subtitles.english: I'll get four points!

subtitles.original: I'm pretty sure the zombie is not going to run away anymore...
subtitles.english: I'm pretty sure the zombie is not going to run away anymore...

subtitles.original: ...so I think he's tired.
subtitles.english: ...so I think he's tired.

subtitles.original: It's up to you, you gotta outrun it! - I'm the best driver!
subtitles.english: It's up to you, you gotta outrun it! - I'm the best driver!
